text: Clive Limpkin (1937 â€“ 13 May 2020) was a British photojournalist and writer. He worked as a photojournalist for The Sun in the 1960s and 1970s before joining the Daily Mail. He also worked as a freelance photographer for the Daily Express, The Sunday Times, and The Observer. Limpkin died at his home in London of brain cancer on 13 May 2020 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:British photojournalists Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer
title: Clive Limpkin
